tweets.text:
This picture makes me so happy man. Thanks to everyone involved and all of you coming out supporting it. And Tech crew you guys did absolutely amazing work and deserve all the praise in the world. 

And to our lovely hosts at _Maral and at ChariseHamme , you guys absolutely killed it
If you're at the Scandic Elmia hotel, dont forget to get a delicious AlienPls in the bar, I made this 🤠👍

Will be live at 11pm today for the Scuffed Late Night Show benefitting Save the Children 🤠👍 

Gonna be doing Truth or Dare, dont ask me about the Kitkat story
Just cleaned the drainage pipe to my shower and that goes down as one of the grossest things I have ever done, that smell is unimaginable

Been awhile since I posted one of these! Whenever I visit my grandmother I always try to draw something, and sometimes I truly impress myself.

I call this one "Squirrel Christmas" because it's a squirrel celebrating Christmas with his christmas tree..inside his tree 🤔

YOOOOOOOOO

Wrapping up this hell of a randomizer , then I'm gonna be running from Michael Jackson in brand new horror game 🤠👍

Heya everybody! Thanks for all your kind words yesterday, means a lot to me =) Feeling lotsa better today!

Continuing Randomizer today for a good 4-5 hours, then probably checking out some lidl horror games

Been at my dads place for some birthday cake and meeting relatives, came home and felt completely drained mentally.. An odd feeling that I don't feel a lot and I feel if I went live now I wouldn't be engaged with chat at all which is the whole point of streaming for me 😑

5x5 160kg! Been following a strict 5x5 schedule for awhile in order to finally beat my 1 rep max mainly in deadlifts which is 200kg. Seeing as I've never been able to do 5x5 at 160kg id say the goal is very much in…

DANKEY KANG Country 2 race!

Winner gets 100 subs and Hibiki Whiskey bottle 🤠👍

Donkey Kong Country 2 "blind" race today against at cbRoFL and at Distortion_2 

There will be speed, violence and momentum. Honor is on the line and I will come out victorious.

7pm CET

More Dark Souls foggate + item randomizer 

=

More misery and pain 🤠👍

Forgot to tweet I was live, insanely professional streamer 🤠👍

Anyways I'm gonna be checking out  at GoodShepherdEnt 's Black Future '88 hashtag ad

and then hop on some This War of Mine and Worms against chat (always winning 😏)
Dark Souls Fog-gate + Item randomizer today, probably a really good AND a really bad idea..
